text: Aaron Opoku-Tiawiah (born 28 March 1999) is a German professional footballer who plays as a left winger for Jahn Regensburg on loan from Hamburger SV. ==Career== Opoku made his professional debut for Hansa Rostock in the 3. Liga on 20 July 2019, starting in the home match against Viktoria Köln. He scored with a backheel in the 19th minute to put Rostock 3–0 ahead, before being substituted out in the 67th minute for Marco Königs, with the match finishing as a 3–3 draw. ==Personal life== Opoku was born in Hamburg, Germany and is of Ghanaian descent. ==References== ==External links== * * Profile at kicker.de Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Hamburg Category:German footballers Category:Germany youth international footballers Category:German people of Ghanaian descent Category:Association football wingers Category:Hamburger SV II players Category:Hamburger SV players Category:FC Hansa Rostock players Category:SSV Jahn Regensburg players Category:2. Bundesliga players Category:3. Liga players Category:Regionalliga players
title: Aaron Opoku
